verses.text:
Blessed Jesus, at Thy word
We are gathered all to hear
Thee; Let our hearts and souls be stirred
Now to seek and love and fear
Thee; By Thy teachings sweet and holy,
Drawn from earth to love Thee solely.

Glorious Lord, Thy self impart!
Light of light, from God proceed
With the beams of Thy heart,
Help us by Thy Spirit's pleading;
Hear the cry Thy people raise us,
Thou must work all good within us.
